short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lighting lamp allows you to have cool tabs. It supports many features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lighting lamp is a very useful TAB extension. It integrates calendar, clock, memos, vpn, chatgpt, news, quick jump links. There are many more features to be developed. I look forward to hearing from you



Lighting lamp does it like this:



Calendar: This feature allows users to easily view the date and time, providing an interface for browsing the current date, week, or month.



Clock: Displays the current time. Users can easily access the clock feature from the browser's home page.



Custom Quick Links: This feature allows users to create custom quick links to commonly used web pages or applications. Users can add, edit, and delete these shortcut links as needed.



Memos: This feature provides a convenient interface for creating, editing, and managing memos. Users can log important projects, tasks or inspirations and set reminders to ensure they don't miss anything important.



Background change: Always change the wallpaper, customize your home page



vpn: Provides a free vpn for users and enables users to access other websites



News: We provide users with real-time updates, so that users timely get the latest news



chatgpt: Provides two interfaces for gpt4.0 to give users more answers



Snow Mountain is a very useful new TAB extension that allows you to have better looking new tabs. There are many more features to be developed. I look forward to hearing from you
